en.heroSubtitle: JOLY LIU - IFBB PRO FITNESS COACH
en.aboutDesc: Six years ago, I wasn't a sporty person. I was lazy, dissatisfied with my own physique. I was once bullied because of my body type, and I didn't want to be called "fat" anymore. So, I stepped into the gym. During the process, I slowly saw the change in my physique and also discovered my passion for fitness. I then embarked on the path of bodybuilding and became the youngest IFBB Pro in Taiwan in 2022.

competitive.title: Amateur
accomplishments: I did 24 Amatuer bodybuilding shows in total Participated in Men's Physique, Classic Physique and Bodybuilding divisions.

competitive.title: Professional
accomplishments: Earned my IFBB Pro card in NPC Taiwan Pro Qualifier.
IFBB Pro League TAIWAN PRO 5th Place

en.customDesc: My personalized training program is designed to help you achieve your unique fitness goals. With individualized sessions, we focus on your specific objectives, whether it's building strength, improving flexibility, or enhancing overall wellness. I provide tailored guidance and unwavering support throughout your fitness journey to ensure you reach your full potential.

features: Present your own physique strength & hide weaknesses

en.pricingInfo: Long-term commitment allows for monitoring, successful foster workout routine, and effective physique trans formation.Recommend starting from 2-3 months.

zh.heroSubtitle: JOLY LIU - IFBB PRO 健身教練
zh.aboutDesc: 六年前的我，不愛運動、懶惰、對自己的體態不滿意 曾經因為身材被語言霸凌，不想再當「小胖子」而決心開始訓練 過程中，我慢慢看到自己體態的改變，也找到了對於健身的熱誠 於是開始了健美的道路，也在2022年成為了台灣最年輕的健體IFBB Pro.

competitive.title: 業餘
accomplishments: 總共參加了24場健美比賽其中包括了男子健美、古典健美和健美三個組別

competitive.title: 職業
accomplishments: 在 NPC 台灣職業資格賽中獲得了 IFBB 職業卡。
IFBB 職業聯賽 台灣職業 第五名

zh.customDesc: 我的個人化訓練計劃旨在幫助您達成獨特的健身目標。透過個別化的訓練課程，我們專注於您的具體目標，無論是增強力量、提升柔韌性還是促進整體健康。我將在您的健身旅程中提供量身定制的指導和堅定的支持，確保您充分發揮潛力。

features: Present your own physique strength & hide weaknesses

zh.pricingInfo: Long-term commitment allows for monitoring, successful foster workout routine, and effective physique trans formation.Recommend starting from 2-3 months.
